Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI doesn’t get frustrated or tired. It is always available. It can explain thing in different ways if you don’t understand.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: It’s easier to build a connection/relationship with a teachers which can make you feel good/bad. AI feels neutral.
